name: Rocket Launch XR for Oculus Quest
name_original: Rocket Launch XR for Oculus Quest
description:
5,4,3,2,1 ..we have lift off!  Three New Actual Size Rockets of the World on the Oculus Quest

Grab a real-world rocket from the picture and examine it in your hand as a scale model. Put it on the pedestal and launch launch it into the sky. Wait for the parachute and follow it as it descends to the ground. Then choose "full size" and see an accurate full size version rise from the silo. Hit the Launch button and watch it fly! 

Feel the awesome size and power of actual rockets.

Learn some facts about each. Look behind you for a browser to explore the rocket's web page dig deep into each rocket.

  • Beautifully rendered and scaled  full  full size rockets for realistic experience.
  • Use the motion controller to select the rocket and check it out in your hand, up close.
  • Launch a scale model for fun.
  • Fully experience room scale immersive views close up and from all angles.
  • Dazzling smoke effects and great sound.
In V0.91 of Rocket Launch XR! :
  • 3 exciting new rockets in this edition plus the demo Starship
    • Saturn V (USA)
    • March 7 (China)
    • Soyuz-FG   (Russia)
    • + SpaceX Starship from Demo
  • Browse relevant web pages for each rocket with built in browser
  • Other minor improvements and fixes
Future Features:
  •  Apply your own decals and pictures on the scale model and see it full size.
  •  Launch the scale model then teleport to it to catch it as it drops by parachute.
  • Choose your model engine and see the effects on each launch.
  • Share the launch with multi-user
  • Lot's more real-world rockets!

Check out the Rocket Launch XR Website

Rockets of the World poster image by Tyler Skrabek buy it on Etsy here:  Purchase Rockets of the World Poster  

Note: No copyright infringement is intended in this app
